price: Monfa wͻn nsan merε me; na ͻhyεε aseε de ne nsa fefaa wͻn nnan ho ne wͻn kͻn ho.
arabic: رُدُّوهَا عَلَيَّۖ فَطَفِقَ مَسۡحَۢا بِٱلسُّوقِ وَٱلۡأَعۡنَاقِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: ruddūhā ʿalayya faṭafiqa masḥan bil-sūqi wal-aʿnāqi
